（ついに『もやし料理』をルミナスのみんなに、
振舞う日が来た。やよいは朝から楽しそうだ……）

(Finally, a "bean sprout dish" for all the luminous people,

source:
プロデューサー！
ようやくもやし祭りができますね！

Producer!
Finally, we can have a bean sprout festival!

source:
プロデューサーも一緒だし、
ルミナスのみんなも来てくれるし……
translatedstr:
And the producer is with us,
Everyone from Luminous will be there. ......

source:
これって、もやし大パーティーですよね！
うっうー！　すーっごく楽しみです！
translatedstr:
This is a big bean sprout party!
I am soooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo looking forward to it!

source: やよいの家では変わらずもやし祭り、してるのか？

source:
はい！
でも、こんなに大勢でやるのは初めてかも！？
translatedstr:
Yes!
But maybe this is the first time I've done it with so many people!

source:
みんなが喜んでくれると嬉しいです！
張り切ってお料理しちゃいますねー♪
translatedstr:
I hope everyone is happy!
I'm going to cook up a storm!

source: ああ、俺も楽しみだ！
translatedstr: Yeah, I'm looking forward to it too!

source:
（最近は気負いすぎてるところがあったけど、
今日は自然な笑顔だ。肩の力が抜けたんだろう）
translatedstr:
(I've been feeling a little over-enthusiastic lately,
(She's smiling naturally today; her shoulders must have loosened up.)

source:
プロデューサー、にこにこですね。
プロデューサーは、もやし好きですか？
translatedstr:
Producer, you are smiling.
Do producers like sprouts?

source: 好きだ
translatedstr: I like it.

source: 苦手
translatedstr: weak (in)

source:
ああ、好きだよ。
もやしは何にでも合うよな
translatedstr:
Yeah, I like it.
Sprouts go with everything.

source:
そうなんです！　炒めても揚げても煮てもいいし、
サラダにも使えて万能ですよね
translatedstr:
Yes, you can fry it, fry it, deep fry it, or boil it,
It's versatile enough to use in salads.

source:
あっ、プロデューサーの好きなもやし料理、
聞くのを忘れてました！
translatedstr:
Ah, the producer's favorite bean sprout dish,
I forgot to ask!

source:
腕によりをかけて作りますから、
食べたいもの、言ってくださいね！
translatedstr:
We put a lot of effort into making them,
Please tell me what you want to eat!

source: ……実は、もやしは苦手なんだ
translatedstr: ...... Actually, I'm not a fan of sprouts.

source: ええっ、そうだったんですか！？
translatedstr: Oh, yeah, that's right!

source:
でも、やよいの作るもやし料理は最高だと思う。
俺もいくらでも、いっぱい食べられそうだよ
translatedstr:
But I think the bean sprout dishes that Yayoi makes are the best.
I could eat as much or as little as I want.

source:
だったら、プロデューサーの好きなものを作ります！
せっかくのお祭りですから！
translatedstr:
Then we make what the producer likes!
It is a festival!

source:
あはは、ありがとう。
こういうやり方が、やよいらしいな
translatedstr:
Haha, thanks.
This kind of approach is typical of Yayoi.

source: えっ……？　私らしい、ですか？
translatedstr: What, ......? Is that like me?

source:
ああ。今は無理に頑張ろうとしてないだろう？
やよいの得意なことで、みんなを支えようとしている
translatedstr:
Yeah...you're not trying to push too hard right now, are you?
Trying to support everyone in what they do best, which is yayoi.

source: これがやよいらしい『先輩』像なんじゃないか？
translatedstr: Isn't this the image of "senpai" that is typical of Yayoi?

source:
これが私『らしい』……ですか？
うーん……でも、私、何にもしてないですよ？
translatedstr:
Is this my 'typical' ......?
Hmmm ...... but I didn't do anything, did I?

source:
やよいが一番、楽しいと思える状態が
いいってことだよ
translatedstr:
The state in which Yayoi can have the most fun.
I mean it's okay.

source:
楽しいって思える……
あの、今はすっごく楽しいです！
translatedstr:
It sounds like fun. ......
Well, I'm having a lot of fun right now!

source:
今まで無理して先輩らしくしようとしてた時は、
楽しかったか？
translatedstr:
When I've been trying to force myself to be a senior,
Did you have a good time?

source:
みんなが喜んでくれると嬉しかったけど……。
『楽しい』とは違ったかも
translatedstr:
I would have been happy if everyone was happy, but .......
Maybe it wasn't "fun."

source:
先輩らしく振舞おうとするのもいいんだが、
自分のできる範囲で無理せず、が大事だぞ
translatedstr:
It's okay to try to act like a senior,
Don't push yourself too far, just as long as you can do it.

source:
もちろん、楽しくも大事だ。
元気に笑ってるのが一番やよいらしいからな
translatedstr:
Of course, fun is also important.
It's the most Yayoi-like to be smiling cheerfully.

source:
はいっ！
そういうことなら任せてくださいー！
translatedstr: If that's the kind of thing you're looking for, leave it to me!

source:
えへへ。私が楽しいなーって思えること、
無理しなくてもできることで良かったんですね
translatedstr:
Heh heh...that I can have fun with,
It's good that you didn't have to push yourself to do it.

source:
よーし、まずはもやし大パーティーですよね！
みんなが来る前に準備しちゃいましょう！
translatedstr:
Okay, first of all, it's a big bean sprout party!
Let's get ready before everyone arrives!

source:
ああ、そうだな。
……やよい、アレ、やっとくか？
translatedstr:
Oh, yes.
......Yay, you want to do that thing?

source:
そうですね！　それじゃあ、
ハイ、ターッチ！　イェイ！
translatedstr:
Yes, that's right! Okay then,
Hi, Turch! Yay!

source:
（事務所に着くと、やよいが掃除をしていた。
今日も元気そうだ）
translatedstr:
(When I arrived at the office, Yayoi was cleaning up.
(You're looking good today.)

source: おはよう、やよい。早く来てたんだな
translatedstr: Good morning, Yayoi, you're here early.

source:
おはようございます、プロデューサー！
えへへー……
translatedstr:
Good morning, producer!
Ehehe ......

source: どうした、ずいぶんご機嫌じゃないか？
translatedstr: What's the matter, are you in a good mood?

source:
今日はお掃除がたくさんできたから、
なんだか、楽しくなっちゃいました♪
translatedstr:
I got a lot of cleaning done today,
It was kind of fun... ♪

source:
そうか、それはいいこと……って、
俺の机の上にあるお弁当は……？
translatedstr:
Well, that's a good thing ......,
Is the lunch on my desk ......?

source:
私が作ってきました！　プロデューサー、
忙しいとご飯食べないですよね？
translatedstr:
I have made it! Producer,
You don't eat when you are busy, do you?

source:
ご飯は元気の素ですから！　どんなに忙しくても、
ちゃんと食べなきゃ、めっ、ですよ！
translatedstr:
Food is the source of energy, no matter how busy you are,
You have to eat properly, meh!

source: は、はい……
translatedstr: Y-Yes...

source:
あっ、今からみんなのレッスン着を洗濯するんです。
よかったら、プロデューサーのシャツも洗いますよ♪
translatedstr:
Oh, I'm washing everyone's lesson clothes now.
If you like, I can wash the producer's shirt too.

source: お、俺のシャツ……？
translatedstr: Oh, my shirt ......?

source:
プロデューサー、この前着替えた時、
シャツ置きっぱなしでしたよ
translatedstr:
Producer, the last time I changed my clothes,
You left your shirt on the table.

source: はい、これ。ポケットに入ってたメモです！
translatedstr: Yes, here it is...a note in my pocket!

source:
ありがとう……。さすがやよい、気が利くな。
それに家事もお手の物って感じだな
translatedstr:
Thanks ....... That's very thoughtful of you, Yayoi.
Plus, it sounds like you're pretty handy with the housework.

source: えへへー。家事は得意なんですよ！
translatedstr: Ehehe...I'm good at housework!

source:
それに、得意なことでみんなの役に立てるのは、
すっごくうれしいなーって
translatedstr:
Besides, I can help everyone by being good at what I do,
I'm so happy.

source:
そうか。
本当に助かるよ
translatedstr:
Okay.
That would be really helpful.

source:
はい！　任せてください！
私、頑張っちゃいますよーっ！
translatedstr: I'll do my best!

source:
ありがとう、やよい。
けど、大変だったんじゃないか？　特に……
translatedstr:
Thanks, Yayoi.
But it must have been hard work, especially ......

source: お弁当
translatedstr: bento (Japanese box lunch)

source: 掃除
translatedstr: cleaning

source: 洗濯
translatedstr: laundry

このお弁当。……うん、どれも俺の好物ばかりだ。
これって、相当手間がかかったんじゃないか？
translatedstr:
This lunch. ...... Yeah, they're all my favorites.
This must have taken a lot of work, right?

source:
あの、時間はかかっちゃいましたけど、
プロデューサーにどうしても食べてもらいたくって
translatedstr:
Um, it took a long time,
I really wanted the producer to try it.

source:
ありがとう。最近コンビニばかりだったから、
嬉しいよ……うん、おいしい！
translatedstr:
Thank you, I've been at a lot of convenience stores lately,
Glad you enjoyed ...... Yeah, it's delicious!

source:
本当ですかっ！
よろこんでもらえて、すっごく嬉しいです！
translatedstr:
Really?
I am very happy that you are pleased!

source:
お弁当、また作ってきますね！
プロデューサーの好きなおかず、いーっぱい入れて！
translatedstr:
I'm going to make lunch again!
Put in as many of the producer's favorite side dishes as you like!

source:
うちの事務所、結構広いから……。
俺もやらなきゃと思いつつ、つい後回しで……
translatedstr:
Our office is quite large, so please visit .......
I've been thinking I should do it too, but I keep putting it off. ......

source:
私、お掃除大好きですから、
広いですけど、ヘッチャラです！
translatedstr:
I love cleaning,
It's a big place, but it's a heck of a lot of space!

source:
それに、お掃除はやろうと思った時に、
えいっ！　ってやっちゃわないとダメなんですよ～！
translatedstr:
Besides, clean up when you decide to do it,
You have to go for it!

source:
だから、私に任せてくださいー！
いつでも、ピカピカにしちゃいます♪
translatedstr:
So, leave it to me - I'll take care of it!
We'll always make it shine.

source:
洗濯は水を使うから、
手とか荒れなかったか？
translatedstr:
Because laundry uses water,
Didn't you have rough hands or anything?

source:
大丈夫です。それに、
実は洗うものあんまりなくて、その……
translatedstr:
It's okay,
Actually, I don't have much to wash. ......

source: もしかして、俺のシャツだけだったとか……？
translatedstr: Maybe it was just my shirt or ......?

source: えっと……はい、そうでしたー
translatedstr: Let's see... ...... Yes, I did...

source:
ありがとう。
でも、あんまり無理はするなよ？
translatedstr:
Thank you.
But don't take it too hard, okay?

source:
はい！　大丈夫ですよー！
私やっと『私らしいせんぱい』を見つけたんです♪
translatedstr:
Yes! It's okay!
I have finally found my "personal Senpai".

source:
得意なことで、できる範囲で無理しないで……。
これが私なりの、せんぱいかなーって♪
translatedstr:
Be good at what you do and don't overdo it as much as you can. ......
This is my own way of thinking about Senpai.

source:
掃除や洗濯が得意な先輩か……。
まるで、一家のお姉さんみたいだな
translatedstr:
Are you a senior who is good at cleaning and laundry or .......
You sound like the sister of the family.

source: プロデューサー……？

source:
いや、何でもないよ。
やよいらしい先輩、すごくいいと思うぞ
translatedstr:
No, it's nothing.
I think it's very nice, Yayo-esque senpai.

source:
うっうー！　ありがとうございます！
これからも私らしく、頑張りまーっす！
translatedstr:
Woohoo! Thank you very much!
I will continue to do my best, just like me!

source:
（仕事の待ち時間、やよいは現場のスタッフの

(While waiting for work, Yayoi is a member of the staff on site.

私も手伝いますー！

You're going to clean this place up, right?

あっ、シャツのボタンが取れてますよ！
貸してください、すぐ付けちゃいますから！
translatedstr:
Oh, your shirt is unbuttoned!

source:
やよい、いいことだとは思うけど、
そこまでしなくてもいいんだぞ
translatedstr:
Yay, I think it's a good thing,
You don't have to go that far.

source:
ダメ、ですか？　あんまり気にしすぎると、
みんなの邪魔になっちゃいますか？
translatedstr:
No, sir? I don't want to worry too much about it,
Am I disturbing everyone?

source:
いや、みんな助かるって言ってくれてる。
でも、なんだか……
translatedstr:
No, they all say it helps.
But it's kind of ......

translatedstr: What is it? ...... Well, what is it?

やよいって、お姉さんなんだな。歳とか関係なく、

translatedstr:
Yayoi, you're a big sister, no matter how old you are,

source:
いろんな人のおかげで私、アイドルできてますけど
私もいろんな人をお手伝いしたくて……
translatedstr:
Thanks to various people, I am able to be an idol.
I also wanted to help a lot of people ......

source:
みんな家族みたいって思ってて……そんな中で
私がお姉さんできてたら、すっごく嬉しいです！
translatedstr:
I thought everyone was like family. ...... in that situation.
I would be very happy if I could be your sister!

source:
家族か……
やよいらしい考え方でいいと思うぞ
translatedstr:
Family or ......
I think that's a very Yayoi way of thinking.

source:
よーし、どんどん家族を増やしていって、
大家族を作っちゃいましょー！
translatedstr:
Good, keep adding to your family,
Let's make a big family!

source: ……壮大な計画だな
translatedstr: ...... That's a grand plan.

source: 家族は多い方が、賑やかで楽しいですから！

source:
大忙しで、あっという間に時間が
過ぎちゃいますけど、そういうのもいいかなって！
translatedstr:
It was very busy and time flew by.
It's a bit too much, but I thought it would be nice!

source:
ああ、そうだな。
それが働くことのやり甲斐ってものかもな
translatedstr:
Oh, yes.
Maybe that's what makes working worthwhile.

source:
プロデューサーも、
一生懸命お仕事、頑張りましょう～！
translatedstr:
Producers,
Work hard, work hard!

source:
ああ、俺ももっと頑張るよ。まるで
家族みたいな、たくさんの人たちのために
translatedstr:
Yeah, I'll try harder too, as if.
Like a family, for many people.

source:
そうですよね～！　家族の笑顔を想像すると、
頑張ろ～って気持ちになりますっ！
translatedstr:
That's right~! Imagine the smiles on the family's faces,
It makes me feel like I'm doing my best!

source:
あっ、みんなが家族だとしたら、
プロデューサーはみんなをまとめる……
translatedstr:
Oh, if everyone is family,
Producers bring everyone together: ......

source: まとめる……？
translatedstr: Summarize: ......?

translatedstr: You are the older brother!

source:
お兄さんか！
はは、照れるな……
translatedstr:
Brother!
Haha, don't be shy: ......

source:
あれ、でもプロデューサーはお父さんのほうが
似合うかな？　だけどやっぱりお兄さんで……
translatedstr:
Oh, but the producer is more of a father.
I don't know if it'll look good on me, but I'll go with my brother: ......

source:
いや、お兄さんでもお父さんでもうれしいよ。
これからも、力を合わせて一緒に頑張ろう
translatedstr:
No, I'm happy to be your brother or father.
Let's continue to join forces and work together.

source:
うっうー！　これからもよろしくお願いします、
